summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the extension until August 31, 1975 of a contract with the Mountain Tree Farm Company for the sale and removal of certain timber on Sections 21 and 27, Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W.M., and in the SW 1/4 of the NE 1/4, Section 2, Township 21 North, Range 9 East, W.M., in the Cedar River Watershed.
